reviewText: This DVD does not work on USA DVD Players. I had to send it back tho I had been looking for it for years. I was so disappointed. It was not the fault of the shipper it is just the format is incorrect for here.
Very good. Been looking for it the last 10years.
love barbara taylor bradford books and this movie was good too
I loved this movie, only thing is that I am sorry I can't watch it in my DVD player.
I wanted this movie in DVD, but got it in VHS.  Haven't been able to watch it, but I loved the movie when it played on TV.
It had arrived in a timely manner and it appears to be in good shape but with the holidays I haven't had time to watch it, so I don't know how it plays.  I'm hoping as well as it looks.

At first I thought..."My god, when does the story start ?". It takes quite a while until the story gets in motion but you won't be disappointed !  It's a very exciting movie (mini-series - whatever) and you  can't get your eyes off the screen. Donna Mills gives a great performance  and she looks GREAT !
